resources.string:
THIS APP was developed by application developers group HND2 2017 
 HELP
 The application helps you to compute a semester resul of less than or equal to 9 courses of any kind provided you enter your results and course load for each coursse entered correctly
 HOW TO USE THE APPLICATION
 Not minding the courses on the interface,you are espected to enter yuor scores and its corespong course unit AND then click compute to view your performance per course and also see your overall performance
 NB: IGNORE EMPTY SPACES AND ITS UNIT IF YOU DONT OFFER THE WHOLE NINE COURSES
 CONTACT THE GROUP @ 07036164045 IF YOU HAVE ANY PROBLEM WITH THIS APPLICATION
 Thanks for your patronage
